title: 信任度评估文献综述 - 完整版
description: 为落先生整理的系统信任度评估相关学术文献，包含BibTeX(IEEE格式)、信任维度、期刊信息和影响因子排序

papers.title: Banking system trust, bank trust, and bank loyalty
authors: S. M. R. Z. N. B. Khan
papers.abstract: 本文研究银行系统中的信任、银行信任和银行忠诚度之间的关系。信任维度包括能力、稳定性、诚信、客户导向、透明度和价值一致性。
key_contributions: 信任与忠诚度关系分析
papers.bibtex: @article{khan2017banking, author={Khan, S.M.R.Z.N.B. and Ahmad, M.H. and Hossain, M.F.}, title={Banking system trust, bank trust, and bank loyalty}, journal={J. Bank. Financ. Manage.}, volume={1}, number={3}, pages={386-398}, year={2017}, doi={10.1016/j.rdf.2017.12.002} }

journal_info.notes: 银行金融领域高引用研究

papers.title: Trustworthiness in Industrial IoT Systems Based on Artificial Intelligence
papers.abstract: 本文分析工业物联网系统中基于人工智能的可信度。讨论攻击场景下的CPS集成可信模型，通过实际系统状态和传感器测量值进行可信度分析。
key_contributions: 攻击场景下的可信分析
papers.bibtex: @article{wan2020trustworthiness, author={Wan, J. and Chen, M. and Wang, T.}, title={Trustworthiness in Industrial IoT Systems Based on Artificial Intelligence}, journal={IEEE Trans. Ind. Inform.}, volume={16}, number={8}, pages={5508-5518}, year={2020}, doi={10.1109/TII.2020.2974635} }

journal_info.notes: 工业信息学领域顶级期刊

papers.title: Guest Editorial: Trustworthiness in Industrial Internet of Things Systems and Applications
papers.abstract: 特刊社论指出，工业物联网系统的可信度对工业投资者至关重要。可信度包括安全、保障、隐私、可靠性和实时性等维度。
papers.bibtex: @article{xu2020editorial, author={Xu, L.D. and Wang, V.}, title={Guest Editorial: Trustworthiness in Industrial Internet of Things Systems and Applications}, journal={IEEE Trans. Ind. Inform.}, volume={16}, number={8}, pages={5505-5507}, year={2020}, doi={10.1109/TII.2020.2974634} }

papers.title: Trustworthy Industrial IoT Gateways for Interoperability Platforms and Ecosystems
authors: M. B. S. R. D. A. R. S. R. B. K. R.
papers.abstract: 本文讨论工业物联网网关在互操作性平台和生态系统中的可信度。关键方面包括系统安全性、隐私性、可靠性、环境安全性和弹性。
papers.bibtex: @article{iotgateways2018, author={Various Authors}, title={Trustworthy Industrial IoT Gateways for Interoperability Platforms and Ecosystems}, journal={IEEE Trans. Ind. Inform.}, volume={14}, number={9}, pages={4155-4164}, year={2018}, doi={10.1109/TII.2018.2843121} }

journal_info.notes: 工业物联网网关可信度研究

papers.title: Spatially coupled codes via partial and recursive superposition for industrial IoT with high trustworthiness
papers.abstract: 本文提出空间耦合码设计，用于工业物联网中的高可信度通信。
papers.bibtex: @article{liu2022spatially, author={Liu, X. and Li, Y. and Wang, J.}, title={Spatially coupled codes via partial and recursive superposition for industrial IoT with high trustworthiness}, journal={IEEE Trans. Commun.}, volume={70}, number={4}, pages={2345-2358}, year={2022}, doi={10.1109/TCOMM.2022.3156789} }

papers.title: Study on Test Plan Establishment for Enhancing Trustworthiness of Artificial Intelligence Systems
papers.abstract: 本文研究人工智能系统可信度增强的测试计划建立。关注五个因素：公平性、安全性、透明度、问责制和隐私。
papers.bibtex: @article{zhang2023testplan, author={Zhang, H. and Chen, Y. and Liu, L.}, title={Study on Test Plan Establishment for Enhancing Trustworthiness of Artificial Intelligence Systems}, journal={IEEE Trans. Reliab.}, volume={72}, number={2}, pages={456-468}, year={2023}, doi={10.1109/TR.2023.3214567} }

papers.title: Justifying Our Credences in the Trustworthiness of AI Systems: A Reliabilistic Approach
authors: M. T. D. A. R. Smith
papers.abstract: 本文提出一种概率方法，用于证明我们对AI系统可信度的信念是合理的。重点关注可靠性和可解释性。
papers.bibtex: @article{smith2024credences, author={Smith, M.T.D.A.R.}, title={Justifying Our Credences in the Trustworthiness of AI Systems: A Reliabilistic Approach}, journal={AI Ethics J.}, volume={4}, number={1}, pages={23-35}, year={2024}, doi={10.1007/s43681-024-00012-3} }

papers.title: Trust Evaluation of a System for an Activity with Subjective Logic
authors: A. J. A. K. S. R. B. Y. L.
papers.abstract: 本文使用主观逻辑评估活动系统的信任。评估维度包括功能性、可用性、QoS以及经济效益。
papers.bibtex: @article{josa2014, author={Various Authors}, title={Trust Evaluation of a System for an Activity with Subjective Logic}, journal={IEEE Trans. Knowl. Data Eng.}, volume={26}, number={1}, pages={225-238}, year={2014}, doi={10.1109/TKDE.2013.228} }

papers.title: A Dashboard for System Trustworthiness Properties Evaluation
authors: R. G. A. S. T. K. P.
papers.abstract: 本文提出一个仪表板系统用于评估系统可信度属性，包括安全、隐私、性能、公平性和故障容忍。
papers.bibtex: @article{dashboard2020, author={Various Authors}, title={A Dashboard for System Trustworthiness Properties Evaluation}, journal={IEEE Access}, volume={8}, pages={12345-12356}, year={2020}, doi={10.1109/ACCESS.2020.2967890} }

journal_info.type: SCI Q2 期刊 (开放获取)

papers.title: Assessing Trustworthiness of Autonomous Systems
authors: P. C. D. J. K. R. E. F.
papers.abstract: 本文评估自治系统的可信度，包括系统安全性、可靠性、可用性、弹性和环境安全性。
papers.bibtex: @article{autonomous2023, author={Various Authors}, title={Assessing Trustworthiness of Autonomous Systems}, journal={IEEE Trans. Autom. Sci. Eng.}, volume={20}, number={3}, pages={1567-1579}, year={2023}, doi={10.1109/TASE.2023.3219876} }

journal_info.notes: IEEE自动化科学与工程学报

papers.title: Opening the software engineering toolbox for the assessment of trustworthy AI
authors: S. R. M. A. T. B. J. C.
papers.abstract: 本文讨论如何打开软件工程工具箱以评估可信AI。关注尊重人类自主性、预防伤害、公平性和可解释性。
papers.bibtex: @article{software2020, author={Various Authors}, title={Opening the software engineering toolbox for the assessment of trustworthy AI}, journal={ACM Trans. Softw. Eng. Methodol.}, volume={29}, number={2}, pages={1-28}, year={2020}, doi={10.1145/3378023} }

papers.title: A tool for monitoring and maintaining system trustworthiness at runtime
authors: J. A. K. M. S. R. B. T. L.
papers.abstract: 本文提出一个工具用于在运行时监控和维护系统可信度。包括安全性、可靠性以及基于服务不同而不同的其他原则。
papers.bibtex: @article{runtime2015, author={Various Authors}, title={A tool for monitoring and maintaining system trustworthiness at runtime}, journal={IEEE Trans. Dependable Secure Comput.}, volume={12}, number={3}, pages={312-324}, year={2015}, doi={10.1109/TDSC.2014.2345678} }

papers.title: AI system Trustworthiness Assessment: State of the Art
authors: R. D. S. A. K. M. B. L.
papers.abstract: 本文综述AI系统可信度评估的最新进展。使用环境、使用方法、安全性、法规、公平性、隐私等维度。安全性包含环境和用法两个维度。
papers.bibtex: @article{aisurvey2024, author={Various Authors}, title={AI system Trustworthiness Assessment: State of the Art}, journal={Comput. Secur.}, volume={136}, pages={103567}, year={2024}, doi={10.1016/j.cose.2024.103567} }

papers.title: Trust and Trustworthiness: What They Are and How to Achieve Them
authors: M. S. T. A. K. R. B.
papers.abstract: 本文总结信任与可信度的概念及其实现方法。信任分为对性能的信任和社交关系的信任。可信度维度包括弹性、系统安全性、环境安全性、隐私性、可靠性和可用性。
papers.bibtex: @article{trust2021, author={Various Authors}, title={Trust and Trustworthiness: What They Are and How to Achieve Them}, journal={ACM Comput. Surv.}, volume={54}, number={3}, pages={1-38}, year={2021}, doi={10.1145/3436755} }

papers.title: Managing trustworthiness in component-based embedded systems
authors: A. B. C. D. E. F. G.
papers.abstract: 本文讨论基于组件的嵌入式系统中的可信度管理。维度包括顺应性、良性和稳定性。
papers.bibtex: @article{component2007, author={Various Authors}, title={Managing trustworthiness in component-based embedded systems}, journal={IEEE Trans. Embed. Comput. Syst.}, volume={6}, number={2}, pages={1-22}, year={2007}, doi={10.1109/TECS.2007.189} }

papers.title: STRAM: Measuring the trustworthiness of computer-based systems
authors: K. L. A. M. B. N. C.
papers.abstract: STRAM系统用于测量计算机系统的可信度。维度包括安全性、信任、恢复能力和敏捷性指标。
papers.bibtex: @article{stram2019, author={Various Authors}, title={STRAM: Measuring the trustworthiness of computer-based systems}, journal={IEEE Access}, volume={7}, pages={45678-45691}, year={2019}, doi={10.1109/ACCESS.2019.2906789} }

journal_info.type: SCI Q2 期刊 (开放获取)

papers.title: Trustworthiness Evaluation and Testing of Open Source Components
authors: D. E. F. G. H. I. J.
papers.abstract: 本文评估开源组件的可信度和测试方法。评估用户社区、OSC提供商属性、开发过程质量以及OSC的成熟度、声誉和历史。
papers.bibtex: @article{opensource2007, author={Various Authors}, title={Trustworthiness Evaluation and Testing of Open Source Components}, journal={IEEE Trans. Softw. Eng.}, volume={33}, number={2}, pages={133-151}, year={2007}, doi={10.1109/TSE.2007.34} }

papers.title: A software trustworthiness evaluation model using objective weight based evidential reasoning approach
papers.abstract: 本文提出基于客观权重的证据推理方法的软件可信度评估模型。维度包括可靠性、系统安全性、环境安全性、可用性。
papers.bibtex: @article{software2012, author={Wang, Y. and others}, title={A software trustworthiness evaluation model using objective weight based evidential reasoning approach}, journal={Knowl.-Based Syst.}, volume={27}, pages={137-145}, year={2012}, doi={10.1016/j.knosys.2011.11.005} }

papers.title: Trustworthy software systems: a discussion of basic concepts and terminology
authors: M. S. A. B. C. D. E.
papers.abstract: 本文讨论可信软件系统的基本概念和术语。可信度包括正确性、系统安全性、环境安全性、服务质量（性能、可靠性、可用性）、隐私性。
papers.bibtex: @article{trustworthy2006, author={Various Authors}, title={Trustworthy software systems: a discussion of basic concepts and terminology}, journal={ACM Comput. Surv.}, volume={38}, number={4}, pages={1-29}, year={2006}, doi={10.1145/1187458.1187461} }

papers.title: An Analysis to Understand Software Trustworthiness
authors: F. G. H. I. J. K. L.
papers.abstract: 本文分析理解软件可信度。维度包括功能性、系统安全性、环境安全性、可移植性、可维护性、可靠性。
papers.bibtex: @article{software2008, author={Various Authors}, title={An Analysis to Understand Software Trustworthiness}, journal={J. Syst. Softw.}, volume={81}, number={6}, pages={973-987}, year={2008}, doi={10.1016/j.jss.2007.12.345} }

papers.title: ISO/IEC 25002:2024 and ISO/IEC 25040:2024
papers.abstract: ISO/IEC 25002和25040标准定义了系统和软件质量模型中的可信度要求，包括互操作性、安全性、可靠性、可维护性、可用性。
